titleStmt.title: Entertainments of the cours: or, Academical conversations. Held upon the cours at Paris, by a cabal of the principal wits of that court. / Compiled by that eminent and now celebrated author, Monsieur de Marmet, Lord of Valcroissant. And rendered into English by Thomas Saintserf, Gent.
Entretiens du cours. English
titleStmt.author: Marmet, Melchior de, seigneur de Valcroissant.

titleStmt.title: Entertainments of the cours: or, Academical conversations. Held upon the cours at Paris, by a cabal of the principal wits of that court. / Compiled by that eminent and now celebrated author, Monsieur de Marmet, Lord of Valcroissant. Entretiens du cours. English
titleStmt.author: Marmet, Melchior de, seigneur de Valcroissant.
St. Serfe, Thomas, Sir, fl. 1668.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.C. and are to be sold at the three Pigeons in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Entretiens du cours.
With added engraved t.p.: Entertienments of the cours at Paris.
With a separate dated title page on A1r with "printed by T.C. for Humphrey Robinson" in the imprint.
Annotation on Thomason copy: the 8 in the imprint date has been crossed out and replaced with a "7".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: Marmet, Melchior de, seigneur de Valcroissant.
